mapper.select: select stores.id, stores.name, stores.categoryId from (( select * from visited_table where (userId, storeId, regDate) in ( select userId, storeId, max(regDate) from visited_table group by storeId, userId ) and userId = 1 order by regDate desc ) as recently_vistied left join ( select * from stores_table ) as stores on recently_vistied.storeId = stores.id ) order by recently_vistied.regDate desc
